messages.content:
According to the archives of Minas Tirith, which one of these is connected to manuscript?

1. manuscript (Artifact)
2. Númenor
3. Meneltarma
4. hood

quality_score.message: Excellent! Your wisdom rivals that of the White Council itself!
next_steps: Continue your journey through the deeper mysteries of Middle-earth.
Share your wisdom with others who seek to understand these ancient tales.

messages.content: According to the lore kept in the libraries of Rivendell, what is the true name of Last Alliance of Elves and Men?

quality_score.message: Even the wisest cannot see all ends. Let us explore this matter further.
quality_score.explanation: The lore of Middle-earth tells us that Last Alliance of Elves and Men.
next_steps: Consult the ancient texts for more knowledge on this subject.
Reflect on the connections between different realms of Middle-earth's lore.
Consider how this knowledge fits into the broader tapestry of Tolkien's world.

messages.content: According to the lore kept in the libraries of Rivendell, what is the Title of Bear?
